Please provide the name of the country(s)
Have you ever used any illicit drugs, recreational drugs, narcotics or drugs which are not prescribed by a doctor?

Have any of your biological parents, brothers or sisters, been diagnosed with any of the following before the age of 60: Multiple Sclerosis, Alzheimer’s, Parkinson’s, Huntington’s disease, motor neuron disease, polycystic kidney disease, heart disease, stroke, hypertension, diabetes mellitus, cancer including carcinoma-in-situ or any other inherited or genetic diseases?

baseQuestion.prompt: Do you have any existing insurance coverage or are you currently applying for coverage with any other insurance companies?
Do you intend to surrender, lapse, terminate or change any of your existing life insurance policies with this application?

Have you ever, for any illness (other than common cold), injury, disease, disorder, physical disability or impairment (including hereditary, congenital, genetic, mental/psychiatric conditions),
  • Consulted any medical practitioner or any alternative health practitioner; or
  • Been investigated or diagnosed and/or received any treatment or medication; or
  • Been advised to undergo follow-up, periodic monitoring or observation?
Other than the conditions you have disclosed above, have you ever been hospitalized, or undergone any medical procedure (including surgeries and endoscopes) on a day-care or outpatient basis?

Other than the conditions you have disclosed above, have you ever had, or been advised to perform any medical test?

Example:
  • Blood/urine/stool test
  • HIV screening
  • X-Ray, Ultrasound, CT/MRI/PET scan
  • Mammogram, Pap Smear
  • Electrocardiogram (ECG), Treadmill ECG, Angiogram, Echocardiogram (ECHO)
  • Biopsy, Fine-needle Aspiration
  • Endoscopy, Laparoscopy

Have you experienced any of the following signs or symptoms in the past six (6) months?
  • Vomiting blood, prolonged cough, blood in urine/stool/phlegm, persistent nose bleed
  • Fainting spells, recurrent severe headache or migraine, blurring of vision, fits
  • Persistent and unexplained fatigue, weight loss, enlarged lymph nodes, or unusual skin lesions
  • Irregular heartbeat, chest pain, numbness
  • Lump/growth/cyst/swelling of any part of the body
  • Abnormal vaginal discharge or prolonged menses, menstruation disorder
  • Change of bowel habits
  • Persistent backache, joint pain
  • Meniscus and ligament injury or tear
Are you pregnant currently?
Is the child born premature or pre-term or less than 37 weeks gestation?
Any special care needed after birth and/or has the child had any physical defects or shown any sign of slow physical or mental development?
Any medical report to be submitted to Allianz?

Endocrine System
(Diabetes Mellitus, Raised blood sugar, Sugar in urine, Thyroid disorders, Goiter, Adrenal gland disorders, Pituitary gland disorders, Parotid gland disorders)

Cardiovascular or Blood or Autoimmune System
(Hypertension, Raised Cholesterol, Heart Attack, Coronary Heart Disease, Palpitation, Heart Valve Disease, Heart Murmur, Congenital Heart Disease, Heart Failure, Rheumatic Fever, Deep vein Thrombosis, Anaemia, Thalassaemia, Systemic Lupus Erythematous, Rheumatoid Arthritis, Idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura (ITP), Abnormal platelet count, Henoch-Schonlein purpura)

Respiratory System or Eyes, Ears, Nose and Throat
(Asthma, Tuberculosis, Bronchitis, Rhinitis, Pneumonia, Sinusitis, Tonsillitis , Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD), Cataract, Glaucoma, Blindness, Impaired hearing, Impaired speech, Vertigo)

Gastrointestinal System
(Gastritis, Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease, Peptic Ulcer, Colitis, Ulcerative Colitis, Crohn’s Disease, Piles or Hemorrhoids, Fistula, Hepatitis or Hepatitis carrier, Jaundice, Fatty Liver, Hernia, Gallstone, Liver cirrhosis)

Genital-Urinary System
(Urinary Stone, Kidney Stone, Protein in urine, Blood in urine, Polycystic Kidney Disease (PKD), Nephrotic syndrome, Glomerular disease, Hydronephrosis, Impaired kidney function, Benign Prostate Hypertrophy)

Congenital or Hereditary Disorders
(Down Syndrome, Congenital defect, Muscular Dystrophy, Huntington disease, Glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase (G6PD) deficiency)

Nervous System or Psychiatric Diseases
(Epilepsy, Paralysis, Stroke, Transient ischemic attack (TIA), Encephalitis, Meningitis, Multiple sclerosis, Dementia, Cerebral Palsy, Depression, Anxiety, Schizophrenia, Suicide Attempt, Parkinson’s Disease, Psychiatric disorder, Panic attack, Insomnia, Bipolar Disorder, Learning disability, Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD), Autism, Alzheimer disease)

Tumor, Cyst, Cancer, Growth, Lymphatic System
(Cyst, Tumour, Lump, Polyps, Hodgkin’s Disease, Enlarge Lymph Glands, Cancer, Leukemia, Haemangioma, Lesions, Bone Marrow Disorders)

Sexual Transmitted Disease, AIDS or HIV Infection
(Syphilis, Venereal Disease, Gonorrhoea, Infection of HIV, AIDS, Herpes, HPV infection)

Musculoskeletal System
(Gout, Hyperuricemia, Arthritis, Osteoarthritis, Prolapsed Intervertebral Disc (PID), Spondylosis, Scoliosis, Ligament Disorder, Muscle Disorder, Joint Disorder, Spine Disorder, Backache, Knee Disorder, Psoriasis, Poliomyelitis, Rheumatism, Severe Skin Infection, Eczema, Burns)

Female Reproductive System
(Fibroids, Ovarian Cysts, Endometriosis, Polycystic Ovarian Disease (POD), Cervicitis, Breast Disorder, Pelvic inflammatory disease (PID), Cervical intraepithelial neoplasia (CIN), Pregnancy/childbirth complications)
Other health conditions that are not listed above

Appendicitis, dengue fever, viral fever, food poisoning or accidental injury?
